CustomField.description: Used to identify new/repeat at the client level. If GES has never worked with this client on ANY show, select "New." If GES has worked with client on this show or any other show, select "Repeat."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If GES has produced any event for this client previously, select "Repeat." If GES has not produced any event for this client, select "New."
CustomField.label: New/Repeat Client
